meanings.definition: The frame or structure surrounding a door.
meanings.sent1: The doorcase was made of sturdy wood.
meanings.sent2: She painted the doorcase to match the walls.
meanings.sent3: The doorcase looked like a friendly giant guarding the entrance.
meanings.sent4: The intricate carvings on the doorcase told a story of its own.
meanings.sent5: The doorcase creaked ominously as it swung open.

meanings.definition: A decorative or functional element around a door.
meanings.sent1: The golden doorknob was the highlight of the doorcase.
meanings.sent2: The doorcase had a beautiful wreath hanging on it.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play with the tassels on the doorcase.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the brightest ornament on the doorcase of life.
meanings.sent5: The intricate patterns on the doorcase caught everyone's eye.

meanings.definition: The entrance or doorway of a building.
meanings.sent1: The grand doorcase welcomed guests into the mansion.
meanings.sent2: She stood at the doorcase, waiting for her friends to arrive.
meanings.sent3: The doorcase seemed to whisper secrets to those who passed through.
meanings.sent4: The doorcase of opportunity opened before him, beckoning him to step inside.
meanings.sent5: The doorcase framed a breathtaking view of the garden outside.
